attributes.action: Stop the Six Nations Rugby going from Free to View to Sky TV
attributes.additional_details: It has been muted that the RFU of Great Britain, may be considering at the end of the 2021 Six Nations competition, that they take away the rights of the BBC & ITV to bid to air the games on Free to View TV & that the rights might be sold to the Sky network. Whilst it is understood, a motion to keep the Six Nations on free-to-air TV has been tabled in parliament by Kevin Brennan, Labour MP for Cardiff West. Which I would fully support. I'm asking all Rugby Fans to support this Petition.
attributes.background: I would like to Petition the Government & Parliament to consider placing a ban on the possibility in 2021of the BBC & ITV losing the right to bid for the free to view rights to bid in showing the games in TV

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300069.
